ai-tika-s0303t11:0_0: the commentary on the colour of Vacchagotta is completed.
ai-tika-s0303t11:1_0: the meaning is: allowable for them: born in them, for the sake of the truth, and for the sake of the highest bliss.
ai-tika-s0303t11:1_1: But in the Commentaries itself is said, “This is the reason why arouse the meaning of what is said,”
ai-tika-s0303t11:1_2: All these five consequences: “These eleven constituents is well established in the eleven constigated,” and the five constituents (of mind and body) that provide fuel for attachment are well constituents (of mind and body).
ai-tika-s0303t11:2_0: The Linked Discourses on Vacchagotta is finished.
